title: MS AccessNow()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MS AccessNow()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the computer system's current date and time:
SELECT CustomerName, Now() AS CurrentDateTime
FROM Customers;

Definition and Usage
The Now() function returns the current date and time based on the computer's system date and time.
Syntax
Now()
Parameter Values
None.
Technical Details
Works in:
From Access 2000

❯
★
+1

content_sections.code:

FROM Customers;

summary: This tutorial covers MS AccessNow()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MS AccessNow()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MS AccessNow()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
